pr_title: Add a gradle properties file with more retries and default parallel build

timeline.message:
Add a gradle properties file

- sets default to parallel builds, we typically want to enable that
  for faster builds as a number of sub-projects can be built in parallel.
  Of note, any tests that could conflict should all be confined to
  a single sub-project, we should then be okay from test non-determinism

- increases gradle dependency retry count and increases back off time.
  With luck this will help reduce transient failures we see on a regular
  basis in CI builds downloading artifacts.

timeline.bodyText: Uhhm I believe you mistyped the name of this file
timeline.author: RoiEXLab

timeline.message: Fix typo in gradle.properties file name
